title: How to Delete Your Uber Ride History (Mobile & Desktop)

steps.title: Open the Uber app on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open the Uber app on your phone or tablet. It's the black icon that says "uber" in white letters. You'll find it on one of your home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching. If you have a driver account associated with your rider account, this method won't delete your account. Instead, fill out Uber's Delete my Driver account form to request deletion.

steps.title: Tap Account in the bottom-right corner.
steps.content: Tap Account in the bottom-right corner. This will pull up all of your Uber account options.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It has an icon of a cogwheel.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . It has an icon of a lock.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Account Deletion.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Account Deletion . It has an icon of a person with an "x" over it. It's the last option on the list.

steps.title: Verify your identity.
steps.content: Verify your identity. Follow the on-screen instructions to verify your identity: Sign in to your account. Verify your first and last name, as well as your phone number. Enter the code sent to your phone number. Enter your password.

steps.title: Click Continue on the screen with your profiles.
steps.content: Click Continue on the screen with your profiles. If you have a profile on Uber Rider and Uber Eats, for example, it will show both of those profiles and how many rides/orders you've placed.

steps.title: Select a reason for deleting your account.
steps.content: Select a reason for deleting your account. You can select one of the listed reasons or choose Prefer not to say . A confirmation message will appear.

steps.title: Tap {{MacButton|Delete} Account} to confirm.
steps.content: Tap {{MacButton|Delete} Account} to confirm. This places your account into "deactivated" status for 30 days. If you don't sign in to your Uber account within that 30-day period, your account and ride history will be permanently deleted. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click your name in the upper-right corner of Uber's webpage.
steps.content: Click your name in the upper-right corner of Uber's webpage. This will open a dropdown menu with a number of options. steps.title: Click Manage account.
steps.content: Click Manage account . It has an icon of a person next to it.

steps.title: Click Privacy & data.
steps.content: Click Privacy & data . It's at the bottom of the left-hand sidebar.

steps.title: Click Privacy Center.
steps.content: Click Privacy Center . This will direct you to a new page with all of Uber's privacy settings.
